text: Morten Espersen (born 21 June 1951) is a Danish rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Danish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Denmark Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Copenhagen
title: Morten Espersen
